title: Delicious bread and butter pudding
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons butter', '12 slices day-old white bread', '750ml of milk, double cream or a mixture of both', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', 'cinnamon to taste', '165g raisins, sultanas or a mixture of both', 'Optional additions', 'marmalade', 'cherry jelly']
